item.title: Insert Congratulatory New Modem!
item.description: We’ve Known Each Other For So Long We got a new modem from $ISP today to make The Slow not be The Slow.

item.title: Git Set Url
item.description: Ah frick, here we go again I was having an issue pushing to a Git repository.

item.title: Microsoft SQL Server Installation, or: Don't Install New Versions of Anything
item.description: In this episode of “Whose Hack Is It Anyway?” we discover the problem of trying to install Microsoft SQL Server, version of the Year of Our Lord 2022, on Windows 11.

item.title: First Day of Class
item.description: First day was today. Instructor was fantastic, though I feel bad because I didn’t really have any questions to ask.

item.title: New year, new website
item.description: Here I am in 2023, about to start anew with a fast-paced developement course!
